name: Bending Spacetime
description:
In the space anomaly, be the last ship standing when space collapses on itself.
3D battle-royale shooter in spaaaace.

Game developed for the Mix and Jam Game Jam 2020 developed in Unity in 32 hours.

Art, 3D models, Shaders, Music, and SFX made by Francisco Murias.
Programming done by Joshua Marlowe.
